local: 在此处键入以搜索文档。。。

origin: Composer is a tool for dependency management in PHP. It allows you to declare the libraries your project depends on and it will manage (install/update) them for you.
local: Composer是PHP中用于依赖关系管理的工具。它允许您声明项目所依赖的库，并将为您管理（安装/更新）这些库。

origin: a package manager in the same sense as Yum or Apt are. Yes, it deals with "packages" or libraries, but it manages them on a per-project basis, installing them in a directory (e.g.
local: 与Yum或Apt具有相同意义的包管理器。是的，它处理“包”或库，但它按每个项目管理它们，将它们安装在一个目录中（例如。

origin: ) inside your project. By default, it does not install anything globally. Thus, it is a dependency manager. It does however support a "global" project for convenience via the
local: )在你的项目中。默认情况下，它不会全局安装任何内容。因此，它是一个依赖关系管理器。但是，为了方便起见，它确实通过

origin: This idea is not new and Composer is strongly inspired by node's
local: 这个想法并不新鲜，作曲家受到node的强烈启发

origin: You have a project that depends on a number of libraries.
local: 你有一个依赖于许多库的项目。

origin: Some of those libraries depend on other libraries.
local: 其中一些库依赖于其他库。

origin: Enables you to declare the libraries you depend on.
local: 使您能够声明所依赖的库。

origin: Finds out which versions of which packages can and need to be installed, and installs them (meaning it downloads them into your project).
local: 找出哪些版本的软件包可以并且需要安装，并安装它们（这意味着它会将它们下载到您的项目中）。

origin: You can update all your dependencies in one command.
local: 您可以在一个命令中更新所有依赖项。

origin: chapter for more details on declaring dependencies.
local: 有关声明依赖项的详细信息，请参阅第章。

origin: Composer requires PHP 5.3.2+ to run. A few sensitive php settings and compile flags are also required, but when using the installer you will be warned about any incompatibilities.
local: 要运行PHP Composer，需要使用PHP Composer。一些敏感的php设置和编译标志也是必需的，但是当使用安装程序时，您将被警告任何不兼容。

origin: To install packages from sources instead of plain zip archives, you will need git, svn, fossil or hg depending on how the package is version-controlled.
local: 要从源代码而不是纯zip存档安装包，您将需要git、svn、fossil或hg，这取决于包的版本控制方式。

origin: Composer is multi-platform and we strive to make it run equally well on Windows, Linux and macOS.
local: Composer是多平台的，我们努力使它在Windows、Linux和macOS上运行得同样好。

origin: Composer offers a convenient installer that you can execute directly from the command line. Feel free to
local: Composer提供了一个方便的安装程序，可以直接从命令行执行。请随意

origin: if you wish to know more about the inner workings of the installer. The source is plain PHP.
local: 如果你想知道更多关于内部工作的安装程序。源代码是纯PHP。

origin: There are in short, two ways to install Composer. Locally as part of your project, or globally as a system wide executable.
local: 简而言之，安装Composer有两种方法。本地作为项目的一部分，或全局作为系统范围的可执行文件。

origin: To install Composer locally, run the installer in your project directory. See
local: 要在本地安装Composer，请在项目目录中运行安装程序。看到了吗

origin: The installer will check a few PHP settings and then download
local: 安装程序将检查一些PHP设置，然后下载

origin: to your working directory. This file is the Composer binary. It is a PHAR (PHP archive), which is an archive format for PHP which can be run on the command line, amongst other things.
local: 到你的工作目录。这个文件是Composer二进制文件。它是一个PHAR（PHP存档），它是PHP的存档格式，可以在命令行上运行，等等。
